function.name: washing_finish
function.description: This function is used to set the completion time for the washing machine cycle.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the completion time.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the completion time.

finishTime.description: The specific time to set as the completion time for the washing machine cycle.
